price: Pede-lhe benevolência quem está nos céus e na terra. Em cada dia, Ele executa uma obra nova.
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yasaluhu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kulla yawmin huwa fī shanin
